sentences.en: As chemists began to pry out my secret they discovered my virtuosity.
sentences.cn: 化学家开始探讨我的秘密,他们发现了我的精湛技巧.

sentences.en: Crows use sticks to pry peanuts out of cracks.
sentences.cn: 乌鸦使用棍子去撬开有裂痕的花生.

sentences.en: Do not abet your friend to pry into other people's privacy.
sentences.cn: 不要唆使朋友去窥探别人隐私.

sentences.en: Don't pry into private life of others.
sentences.cn: 不要窥探别人的私生活.

sentences.en: Don't pry into the affairs of others.
He's always ready to pry into other people's business.
I couldn't pry the cover off this wooden box without breaking it.
sentences.cn: 不打破这个木箱盖我就无法撬开它.

sentences.en: I do not desire to pry into those things.
sentences.cn: 我实在不想故意去探听这类事情.

sentences.en: I don’t want to pry , but I need to ask you one or two questions.
sentences.cn: 我不想唐突，不过我需要问你一两个问题。

sentences.en: If you want to pry into other people'sbusiness you shall not do it here, young man.
sentences.cn: 如果你想刺探别人的隐私，那你来错地方了，年轻人。

sentences.en: Jack managed to pry away a large stone blocking the entrance.
sentences.cn: 杰克设法移开了堵住门口的大石头.

sentences.en: Pry back three clips retaining air cleaner cover to air cleaner housing.
sentences.cn: 撬起三个紧固空气清洁器盖至清洁器壳体的夹环.

sentences.en: Pry the crankshaft forward , position the dial indicator to zero.
sentences.cn: 向前撬曲轴, 定位针盘指示表到0.

sentences.en: She likes to pry into private affairs of others.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢打听别人的私事.

sentences.en: She likes to pry into the private life of her friends.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢打听友人的私生活.

sentences.en: We use an iron bar to pry open the box.

trans.tran_en: to try to find out details about someone else’s private life in an impolite way
to try to find out details about someone else’s private life in an impolite way
